io.libraft.agent.configuration
Class RaftClusterConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  io.libraft.agent.configuration.RaftClusterConfiguration

public final class RaftClusterConfiguration
extends Object

Represents the configuration of a Raft cluster. Contains the following properties/blocks:

  • self (unique id of the local Raft server).
  • members (configuration block for each Raft server in the Raft cluster). members must contain a configuration block for the local Raft server as well.
See the project README.md for more on the configuration.

self - unique, non-null, non-empty id of the local Raft server
